        "9150464e2b2d444c92d5c73385c6688c": {
          "id": "9150464e2b2d444c92d5c73385c6688c",
          "name": "Order Item",
          "script": "(function execute() {\n\nvar cart = new sn_sc.CartJS();\nvar item = { // Note that values using CartJS are instantiated via a JSON object\n\t'sysparm_id': '81c887819f203100d8f8700c267fcfb5',\t\n//\t'sysparm_quantity': '1',\n\t'variables': {\n\t\t//'requested_title': vaInputs.knowledge_base_name.getValue(),\n\t\t//'request_reason' : vaInputs.reason.getValue()\n\t}\n};\n//cart.setRequestedFor(vaInputs.requestinguser);\nvar cartVals = cart.addToCart(item); // The addToCart function returns a JSON object reflecting the status of the cart\nvar checkoutVals = cart.checkoutCart(); // The checkoutCart function returns a JSON object with info about the submitted cart, contents varying if two-step checkout is active\n\nvaInputs.ticket_number=checkoutVals.request_number;\n})()\n",
          "stepType": "ScriptAction",
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          }
        },
